org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.tools.offlineImageViewer

Interface PBImageTextWriter.MetadataMap

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PBImageTextWriter.InMemoryMetadataDB, PBImageTextWriter.LevelDBMetadataMap
    Enclosing class:
    PBImageTextWriter

    private static interface PBImageTextWriter.MetadataMap
extends Closeable
    This metadata map is used to construct the namespace before generating text outputs. It contains two mapping relationships:

  • It maps each inode (inode Id) to its parent directory (inode Id).
  • It maps each directory from its inode Id.
